author: ralexstokes
content: validators are randomly shuffled into attestation committees and _separately_ shuffled into a proposer sequence

author: ralexstokes
content: the proposer receives many consensus rewards, here's a place to start looking at which rewards those are: https://github.com/ethereum/annotated-spec

author: ralexstokes
content: proposer shufflings are stable w/in an epoch and usually stable for the same lookahead as attestation shufflings of 2 epochs

author: ralexstokes
content:
not sure about your last question, but each beacon block is signed by the proposer who proposes it

attesters then turn around and sign off on this block as the head of the chain (if it in fact extends each attesters view of the head of the chain)
